Entries.Town_53_69: I don't really talk to Alexis much... but when she's not around, I love to give Dusty lots and lots of headpats.$0

Entries.Saloon_34_18: %Alexis is focused on the arcade game.

Entries.JoshHouse_10_21: Hi, Alexis. What do you wanna do today?$0

Entries.summer_Victor: I sure could go for some mint chocolate chip ice cream!$1#$b#We should visit Alexis at the ice cream stand by the library soon, @.$3

Entries.summer_Sat: I purchased ice cream from that Alexis girl yesterday. It was delicious.$1#$b#Perhaps Joja should start selling ice cream. Maybe there's a market for it?$5
Entries.summer_Sat6: The ice cream stand ran by Alexis is marvelous!$1#$e#I do enjoy watching the community thrive with their small businesses.$1

Entries.winter_Thu: I often see Alexis visiting the bath house.$0#$b#The workout room is kept in good condition.$4#$e#Maybe because no one but Alexis uses it.$0

Entries.summer_Fri8: We should get ice cream together sometime soon.$1#$e#Alexis said they have a new 'plant based' ice cream. It's apparently healthier for you.$3

Entries.1000017_EverythingOkay: pause 1000/emote George 28/pause 1400/speak George "...I got bad news from Harvey.$2"/pause 800/move George 0 0 2/pause 500/playMusic echos/pause 500/animate George false true 999999 16/pause 1500/speak George "I've had more pain than usual in the mornings, but I didn't think it was a big deal.$2#$b#Evelyn forced me to visit the clinic a few days ago. Harvey found cysts that are the result of... cancer.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 1200/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 650/speak George "I told Evelyn and Alexis. They didn't take the news too well...$2#$b#Evelyn said we'll find the best surgeon in the Ferngill Republic to remove them.$2#$b#Harvey also recommended some specialists in Zuzu City.$2"/pause 1500/speak George "To tell you the truth, I'm scared, @.$2#$b#In times like these, I can only find solace in praying to Yoba.$2"/pause 1000/stopAnimation George/pause 650/move George 0 0 0/pause 1300/speak George "Yoba has helped me before when I asked for it. I'm confident Yoba will lend me the power to get through this.$0"/pause 200/question fork1 "#You have friends and family here to support you.#Praying won't make it better."/fork 1000017_GetThroughThis/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 600/shake George 1000/emote George 28/pause 500/move George 0 0 3/pause 500/speak George "...Leave.$2#$b#Talking to you will surely not help.$2"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship George -1000/end dialogue George "Don't dictate what I should and shouldn't believe in, @.$0#$b#Especially when I just told you I'm very sick...$2"

Entries.CommunityDay_Abigail: Alexis has so much energy... I don't know where it all comes from, but I hate losing.$3#$b#So I'm gonna win this race!$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Abigail_Married: I need you to understand something... There is absolutely no way I'm going to let Alexis challenge me uncontested.$0#$b#So you better cheer me on in this race!$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Sam_Married: Can you watch my stuff while I go lose this race? ...Better yet, can you tell Alexis I'm not allowed to go?$0
